text: Tchaikovsky () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Igor Talankin.Российские и советские номинанты и победители «Оскара»ЧАЙКОВСКИЙ (1969) It stars Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Antonina Shuranova, and Kirill Lavrov. ==Actors== * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky * Antonina Shuranova as Nadezhda von Meck * Kirill Lavrov as Władysław Pachulski * Vladislav Strzhelchik as Nikolai Rubinstein * Yevgeny Leonov as Alyosha * Maya Plisetskaya as Désirée Artôt * Bruno Freindlich as Ivan Turgenev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Igor Talankin
title: Tchaikovsky (movie)
